detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal notification to the Nigerian Exchange Limited and the investing public regarding recent changes to the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc. It outlines the appointment of a new director and the election of a new chairman following recent retirements and resignations.

#### Key Dates
- **Date of Disclosure:** 5 April 2024
- **Date of Appointment of New Chairman:** Following the resignation of the previous chairman, specific date not provided.
- **Date of Appointment of Mr. Emmanuel Jakpa:** Subject to ratification at the next annual general meeting (exact date of the meeting not specified).

#### Board of Directors
- **Current Directors:**
  - Chuka Mordi
  - Shehu Abubakar
  - Osaro Oyegun
  - Evans Jakpa-Johns
  - Maxwell Oko
  - Nnenna Onyewuchi
  - Enotie Ogbebor
  - Chijioke Dozie
  - Joe Attueyi (newly elected chairman)
  - Charles Anajemba

#### Key Appointments
- **New Director:** 
  - **Name:** Mr. Emmanuel Jakpa
  - **Role:** Director (subject to shareholder ratification at the next annual general meeting)
  - **Background:** Principal Partner at BlackRock Law Chambers, legal practitioner with over 20 years of experience in Corporate, Commercial, & Litigation law, particularly in the Maritime & Oil & Gas sectors. Current Chairman of Warri Economic Summit Group and Director at Kalm Marine & Petroleum Services Limited. Holds an LLB from the University of Benin and a BL from the Nigerian Law School.

- **New Chairman:**
  - **Name:** Mr. Joe Attueyi
  - **Role:** Chairman of the Board
  - **Background:** Appointed to the Board on 27 September 2018, recognized for his invaluable contributions to the Company.

#### Resignations
- **Previous Chairman:** Mr. Olumide Akpata has resigned from his position.

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **RC No:** 34296
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com
- **Email:** info@ellahlakes.com

#### Conclusion
The Board of Ellah Lakes Plc expresses confidence in Mr. Emmanuel Jakpa's skills and experience to contribute to the Company's growth and success. The changes in the Board's composition are part of the Company's ongoing governance and strategic development efforts. 

#### Signatory
- **Signed by:** OAKE Legal (Company Secretary) for Ellah Lakes Plc.
